assets.rationale: Rising miner revenues and shrinking exchange reserves indicate positive sentiment; ETF flows suggest institutional interest.

top_signals.evidence: Netto-Abflüsse von Exchanges lassen Reserven schrumpfen.

assets.rationale: Increased Layer-2 activity post-Dencun upgrade and reduced fees are increasing user engagement.
Partnerships with payment providers and increased on-chain security boost confidence.
Growth in infrastructure and on-chain metrics support positive outlook.

macro_summary: Overall market sentiment is positive, driven by strong on-chain and partnership activities across key assets.
method_note: Sentiment analysis based on social engagement, news coverage, and on-chain activity indicators.
